packagegui.name: sasyncd
packagegui.title: Services: VPN Failover

menu.name: VPN failover
menu.tooltiptext: The sasyncd daemon synchronizes IPSec SA and SPD information between a number of failover IPsec gateways. The most typical scenario is to run sasyncd on hosts also running isakmpd and sharing a common IP-address using carp.

field.description: Enter the IP address you would like to use for failover. HINT: You normally want to use a public CARP ip.
